Imagery Description: (a) Two nude women at a laver, with folded drapery on each side of the pedestal; above, Eros striding to right with wreath in right hand and open box in left, (b) Eros seated to left on tendril, holding cista in right hand. Lid: (a) seated draped woman to left with mirror and bunch of grapes, (b) female head in profile to left in floral setting.
